response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $130. This price reflects the product's worth while also ensuring a fair return for me. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow you to enjoy the full benefits of our product.", "product_price": 130}
